results.abstract: Born in Lithuania, raised in South Africa and working in Britain, he made large strides in understanding the structure of proteins, DNA and more.

multimedia.caption: Dr. Aaron Klug at his laboratory in Cambridge, England in 1992. He was a \u0026ldquo;giant of 20th-century molecular biology,\u0026rdquo; the head of the Royal Society in Britain said.
